paintingLabel: Bust of a court lady by Guillaume Coustou (National Museum in Warsaw)
description: A portrait of a young woman, likely a member of the aristocracy, sits in a serene and dignified pose. She wears an elegant dress adorned with intricate lace and delicate folds, with a matching cloak draped over her left shoulder. Her face is softly lit, with a subtle smile playing on her lips. The overall mood is one of quiet contemplation, with a focus on the subject's refined features and gentle beauty. The painting's color palette is characterized by soft pastels and muted tones, with a sense of warmth and intimacy emanating from the overall composition.

paintingLabel: Bust of Louis XIV of France by Jean Varin (National Museum in Warsaw)
description: A grandiose portrait of a majestic monarch, depicted in a three-quarter view, with a stern yet regal expression. He wears a lavish golden crown adorned with precious gems, resting atop his powdered wig and framing his dignified face. His eyes gaze forthwith, exuding authority and confidence. A white periwig drapes elegantly across his shoulders, while a soft, white collar and lace-edged cuffs add to the overall sense of opulence. The subject's face is rendered in delicate, nuanced strokes, with subtle shading and texture adding depth and dimensionality. In the background, subtle architectural details provide context without distracting from the monarch's imposing presence.
